website_summaries.verdict: It costs a little more, but it has a larger than average drawing surface, so it gives you a lot of options.
pros: Works for drawing and tracing, but you also can use it for sewing or quilting projects
Includes a recessed tray along the top to hold pencils
Working surface is slightly tilted, so it's more comfortable to use for drawing
Product has a good longevity and is made in the US
cons: Thicker than some other light box tracers at about 4"

customer_reviews.title: Surface unevenly lit...useless
customer_reviews.text: When I first plugged it in, I thought something was wrong with it. The upper half was brightly lit, but the bottom half was quite dim. I took off the top to see if a bulb had gone out, and saw that that's just how the light box is made. There's a row of tiny led lights across the top that are oriented to face down the length of the box, but they're only strong enough to really light the top half. The Gagne Porta-trace I purchased, while not bright enough for what I wanted, at least had multiple rows of leds, creating an evenly lit surface. This is just useless. I will have to keep looking I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tostein

customer_reviews.title: not bright enough, and too pricy for such dim light.
customer_reviews.text: Not bright enough for cardstock or any kind of heavy paper.
customer_reviews.author: Mahsa E. Schupp

customer_reviews.title: As an applique quilter I have needed a product like this for years
customer_reviews.text: As an applique quilter I have needed a product like this for years. I have had problems with using dark fabrics on light boxes, so this is a dream come true for me after 10 years of using an outdated light box. I also love the larger size, so I applaud the designers for giving us something we have wanted for a long, long time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: scammed customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone interested in animating, I HIGHLY recommend this. I am an animator, and I don't have an animating table, and i don't use tracing paper. I only use standard printing paper, which is harder to see through. So I bought this LightTracer Box for myself. And the Light is EXTREMELY BRIGHT! I can easily see what I'm doing, and it only cost me $40. What I'm not sure is how to replace the light once it runs out. I have had this for over a year, and it hasn't gone out yet. If it does I would probably just buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for drawing!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for professionals and amateurs alike! Very helpful for my drawings and sketches. Sometimes I use it for my paintings as well, to outline before applying oil paint on the canvas 🎨🖌🖼👩‍🎨
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part I like this light box. My problem is the brightness of the light...too bright. An ability to adjust the brightness would make a world of difference. That's the main problem for me. It's much too bright for me. I will keep it. I have a less expensive light pad and it has an adjustable brightness. I would recommend if the brightness could be adjusted...That's the reason i'm giving it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lafarge

customer_reviews.title: I might think about investing on the upgraded version of this lightbox but for now it's pretty good for simple animations and its price
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I expected. I'm using it for traditional animation and I bought the tracing paper for it. Unfortunately the light isn't strong enough on regular printer paper so it'll be quite expensive buying the acme hole punched tracing paper. I might think about investing on the upgraded version of this lightbox but for now it's pretty good for simple animations and its price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Artist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I'm working on a foundation pieced quilt and it allows me to better size the pieces. I'm sure I will find many other uses for it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W. Allen

customer_reviews.title: My Grand Daughters absolutely love it. it is in use a lot
customer_reviews.text: This Grandma hit a Home Run with this purchase. My Grand Daughters absolutely love it. it is in use a lot. It seems to be quite sturdy because it gets a lot of use and is holding up. Good purchase. I may purchase an additional one for Christmas for the family.
customer_reviews.author: acctgmgr

customer_reviews.title: lightbox
customer_reviews.text: It conked out after 2 uses, and the return window had closed! The light kept flashing and there was no way to fix it. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Binky

customer_reviews.title: Good for the serious artist.
customer_reviews.text: While not as slick as some of the new LED tracing tables, I prefer this one with the angled top, good light, and reliable functionality. I had the exact same one in art school that lasted me for 4 years before giving it away. When I got back into drawing again the price and quality of this still seemed to be the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My three kids 4,6 & 8 use this all of the time! They are homeschooled and do a lot of art. It’s been a very nice addition to our home. Have had it for quite a while and it seems very durable and sturdy. I’d recommend this as a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip or Laura L

customer_reviews.title: plastic and bulky
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately i haven't used..ended up buying a newer style at Paducah quilt week...this one was just too bulky to carry around....the one i bought has carry handle, cutting mat and light all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Keeton

customer_reviews.title: Terrific item, large workspace
customer_reviews.text: Love this & needed this a long time ago! Using for applying patterns with gutta resist on silk paintings. Very bright! Easy to use with it sitting on my lap or table top.
customer_reviews.author: Gouldfla

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just plug in and turn on. Very lightweight plastic. Simple design. Good enough for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Debby A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for calligraphy projects
customer_reviews.text: I've used this so much already and it was such a good purchase for tracing calligraphy for my wedding invitation envelopes. I'd recommend it to anyone! Super easy to use and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Augustinsky

customer_reviews.title: Bring 2D to life with light
customer_reviews.text: Totally digging my lightbox and have created many a 2D character and brought them to life on my lightbox. It's wonderful because it's basically old school, like me, and it is the perfect size for creating animation frames for scan up to ToonBoom, Adobe PS and Flash, and similar software.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal K

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if mine was a reject, but I basically threw my money away.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use mine for several months. You know when your Muse is fickle and you work FT plus have classes...so anyway, when I did I found it bothered my eyes. A lot. But the size is nice for a decent sized project, and I started to get into my piece and then the fluorescent gave out on me. Plus, the cardboard in the inside was miss sharpen and stuck out of the top. This whole box was a mess for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: but he thought it worked just fine. I attached with crazy glue some pegs where ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who was taking a traditional animation class and wanted to see more of him instead of him going to campus to use their light box. Yes it's not really really bright, but he thought it worked just fine. I attached with crazy glue some pegs where his paper would loop in on the bottom. Overall, very pleased b/c its light weight, portable, and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I live that this is lightweight. Works great for all art applications.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: This is a "Must Have"!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing asset to my crafting! I wish I had had this years ago. To think of all the years I taped prints to a window & tried to trace them through fabric! I love, love, love this light tracer box!! It is easy to use, light weight, so convenient & easy to carry with me. This would also have been so useful to me all the years I taught school! A wonderfully, clever product.
customer_reviews.author: joeln

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I love the light tracer 2. The price you pay for this compared to the "professional" light tables is great. It does the exact same thing as a professional light table. What I don't understand is why other light tables are so expensive. It's a box with a translucent top and a light tube/bulb inside. Quite simple, yet costs $100+. The light tracer 2 is light, very bright and I've been using it for quite awhile now. I also have the smaller light tracer which works just as great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BIOWORKZ

customer_reviews.title: LOve it, great price fine product!
customer_reviews.text: well, I got this the other day and have been using it every morning since, when I usually draw stuff and I already ADORE it. I will never be without one of these again! its a great size and feels like it made very well simple and clean, I took the sticker off the upper left corner and decorated it with my own stuff (O: and its just a thrill to have such a nice piece of equipment in my studio.
customer_reviews.author: ampm247

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO glad to have this! It is so bright, I can place a 140lb watercolor painting under another 140lb blank sheet, and re-draw my original by tracing. In the past, ruined many drawings, when painting them. No more having to re-draw by hand a difficult drawing. What a blessing and time saver! Love it. Thank you. Would love to have another, even a larger one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected.  I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I was expecting for the projects that I need it for. The light is very dim. I must have purchased a very used item because this came to me looking very discolored and old. Tried to use it twice and now its just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, light weight, works well even through water color paper. Only wish would be for a portrait orientation version, but this still works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. DeLorm

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light box as a gift for my mom who is doing some cartooning. I was slightly hesitant at buying something so cheap (compared to the others at nearly twice its value), but when it arrived, I was very pleased. It is lightweight and looks cheap, but the light is bright and it seems to be a sturdy little thing. My mom has used it at least once now, and she said she is quite happy with it. If you're looking for a good yet non-professional light box, I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alac

customer_reviews.title: Great little box
customer_reviews.text: It is a small box but great for 80% of the regular uses that it is required for a lite box. Well built, light weight and very versatile. Highly recommend for beginning artist requiring help Manga cartoon art. It is built to last which is incredible for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Crafts lover.

customer_reviews.title: Transfer designs the easy way
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little machine for copying patterns to cloth. I had been trying to make applique quilt blocks but kept giving up because it was so difficult to transfer the pattern and leave no marks on the fabric. I wish I had purchased it much sooner, it would have saved me endless frustration. The "not overwhelming" bright light is easy to work with and it is so lightweight for moving and carrying around. Would recommend it to anyone doing that type of work, putting patterns on fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Currie

customer_reviews.title: LightTracer2
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the LightTracer2 for applique and quilting projects. This product exceeded my expectations. The slant of the work top made the actual tracing process comfortable for my arms and hands. The background light was just the right amount. The size of the work area fit on my work table and is the perfect size for my projects. I was able to trace accurately and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I can sit in my recliner and work on my project...fits well and the lighting is great
customer_reviews.author: Irene M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light box
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas and it is an excellent product. The lighting is strong and it works very well for everything I have done so far.
customer_reviews.author: OkieWash

customer_reviews.title: was just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: when my child was trying to learn how to draw at age 8, I bought this for her so she could learn how things were drawn.. over the years she hardly uses this now but she still draws all the time & remembers using th toolin the beginning. She is now in H.S & is a A+ student in art, I highly recommend this for any parent that wants to keep/help thier child in learning to draw.
customer_reviews.author: stutz59

customer_reviews.title: Fashion Must have for a Hard Copy portfolio
customer_reviews.text: The light box arrived early and as specified. It is being a great asset in my fashion sketching. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Lucas

customer_reviews.title: For the budding artist
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter. She had never seen such a thing. Her older cousin (also an artist who got one from me years ago for Christmas) showed her some tricks. She spent the rest of the evening experimenting. Lots of art, lots of creativity and lots of smiles. Its a great size and a bright light.
customer_reviews.author: wlr/buddysbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Great box o light
customer_reviews.text: A great lightbox! It gets hot, but it is worth the money trust me! I feel as though this box has saved many erasers from certain doom! And Amazon sells it cheaper than the craft store. What are you waiting for???
customer_reviews.author: Teddi.Ursine

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase- perfect size super lite and durable and bright enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Super bright and so handy when tracing embroidery designs onto fabric. It is handy to have a cord instead of batteries to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Jonee M. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Good for tracing ... not for negative viewing
customer_reviews.text: Its a box and it lights up. Its probably good for what is name implies ... tracing things. However, I bought it for viewing negatives and I would NOT recommend it for that as the lighting is too uneven. The bulb claims to be a daylight fluorescent, but the opaque perspex cover messes up the transmitted light. Otherwise its well made and arrived week packaged and working.
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: IT LIT UP MY LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy card making and recently bought a dry embossing kit. It required a light tracer light box. I priced one and it cost $99. I was not spending that much for a hobby. I checked on Amazon and found the Artograph tracer for $35.It was delivered immediately and met my needs perfectly. I love using it, and seeing my embossed cards looking so terrific.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ragusa

customer_reviews.title: it's a great light table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seven years ago, and I'm still using it for hand-drawn animations. Clearly, it was built to last. It's a bit bulkier than some of the new models, but for the price, it's a great light table.
customer_reviews.author: Yooks

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: If you need a reasonably priced light box for sewing, cross stitch, or crafting. This will likely meet all your needs. Have used mine for a couple of weeks and am well pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I use my light box all the time. I like to animate and this comes in handy when your doing it the old fashioned way. I have had it for about a year now and the light still comes on with no problems. At one point I was tattooing and it worked great to trace with. Ive traveled with it with no problems as well even though its rather on the big side. It has served its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Cantero Dzines

customer_reviews.title: perfect for use with stained glass
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use as a light box while working and designing with stained glass. While it is a small box it is quite useful for the intended purpose. It is light weight since it is made from plastic, so it is quite portable. There is no assembly involved. It has a switch on it and was considerably cheaper in price than the $45 to $55 the local stores where charging for a similar sized one.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Dittmer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a tracing box.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hand blue print plans and fix some handouts received that where copied off angle. The only thing I don't like is it bows slightly in the middle. And I should have bought a bigger one for over lays, but it is fine for a 8.5x11 with some room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: For Whom the Bell Tolls

customer_reviews.title: inadequate
customer_reviews.text: the lamp light sup only the lower part of the screen unless you have only small items, forget about it
customer_reviews.author: Blue Delfinian

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great for smaller work. But for painting, drawing - works great. The three I ordered all came with a broken bulb that rolls around while shipping and unpacking so be ready to go buy a new bulb - easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Box for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small Light Box awhile back and have been using it in my quilting. At the time I didn't want to spend a big amount of money for one, but needed something to transfer quilting designs to mark on fabric. This has worked out very well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita E. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but not bright enough.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: * Lightweight * Reasonable priced Cons: * Only on or off, not adjustable light strength * The light could be a bit brighter. I tried to trace from a printed picture and a lot of details just won't shine through.
customer_reviews.author: Hans O Karlsson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best light box on the market today. Very bright light easy to follow my pattern transfers.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia . Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great item for beginning animators
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cartoonist just training myself to do animation for the first time. The light box works excellent. You can simply apply tracing velum to the glass and get to work. Real easy to turn on and off and bulb replacement is simple, as well. Definitely a great item if you're a beginning animator, or even if you want to trace or work on art with a little more light.
customer_reviews.author: MWE

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times for tracing stencils. It works well, and I like the angle of it. It is comfortable to place on your lap. I do wish there was an option for brightness, though, as I can forsee tracing through thicker images will be next to impossible.
customer_reviews.author: proshoperz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This light tracer box is wonderful! it works great for tracing embroidery patterns! It was delivered quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not as described. Poorly built. Useless to me.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I bought this lightbox because I was under the impression that the surface was white. This feature was extremely important to why I needed it. When it arrived, lo and behold the surface was BLUE, making it completely useless for the project I was working on. Second, the light has a noticeable dimming flicker to it, which also renders it useless for any stop-motion I intended on testing on it. All in all, an extremely disappointing purchase, product is not well built nor as described.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: A Great deal! It's a decent sized light box and it works great! it's low price makes it a fantastic bargain. A box like this with a slightly bigger size could go for thousands, this is affordable and efficient!
customer_reviews.author: ANagengast

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm a true Artist
customer_reviews.text: I've traced photo's and pictures for ever with a home made light box and have had great success with my projects. But, as a special treat I decided to buy this light box. Its wonderful and has made all my projects easier.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mckennett

customer_reviews.title: Light Box (12x18 Artograph)
customer_reviews.text: (ordered on-line by my Son, for me) - Overall, a great drawing tool - exactly what I needed. - The (working) size was perfect for my needs. - Easy & convenient to use - well lit with a slightly textured surface that helps prevent work slide (as I thought might be a problem) - Great price (under the list price, as seen in local stores) - Shipped/ arrived faster than I would have imagined (oversized Box seemed to be a great choice to prevent any damage) - Very satisfied with the purchase !
customer_reviews.author: oldcorp

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy 2 week it stop working.
customer_reviews.text: The charger gets over heated. The light goes on and off until it didn't work anymore it only lasted for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Art made easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Light Box Tracer Table is so lightweight and portable you can take it almost anywhere that suits your comfort and use it to create the best art designs that you can be inspired by. It gives off plenty light and it makes tracing very easy, even with thick tracing paper. I would recommend this to any one that is a beginner or intermediate skilled artist for any and every project they would like to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Farley Elshot

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I'm drawing up my next tattoos and this is the perfect item for what I'm designing. If anyone rates this as bad they obviously didn't read the description and thought they were buying something else. Even shipped fast, can't ask for a better experience. MIFF
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mifflin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy I did as it saved me money than hiring ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to trace addresses for my wedding invitations. Definitely happy I did as it saved me money than hiring a calligrapher to do it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Let There Be Light!
customer_reviews.text: I received this for Christmas 2015. What a wonderful gift. I have been working on two Farmer's Wife Quilts and wanted a LightTracer so I could fussy cut my fabrics for the quilt blocks. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Scheri

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Art Tool
customer_reviews.text: i am a quilter and I also applique. This light box is perfect for any job I need to do tracing on. it's beautiful, light weight, the best addition to my sewing room this year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: I've had this light tracer for a few months now and really like it. I was taking a graphic design class and it came in very handy. When I first turned it on I was a little worried because I really had to push the light switch hard to get it to turn on, but it hasn't been an issue now that I've got the knack for it. Haven't had any issues with the light aside from that. And the product is very light-weight. I leave it in the box it came in when I'm not using it to make it easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Light box
customer_reviews.text: I love to make jewelry and to take photos of my work. This works perfectly in eliminating those shadows when I can not get enough natural sunlight. It is light weight and quite portable. It works wonderful for tracing my designs and it is a good indication that I can get the same results from this rather than spending a lot of money on more expensive photo equipment. For amateur photography this is a sure bet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Renick

customer_reviews.title: Artograph light tracer
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and works great. Our daughter loves it! It is much better than the crayola one we bought her, that broke in a day!! This one, I can see lasting until she actually grows out of it!!! Which will be never !!! haha She loves it!! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose light box
customer_reviews.text: The light box is "user-friendly," tapered so that it is easy to work on. I would have appreciated a second bulb, the illuminnation is not even, and could be a bit brigher. That being said, I love using the light box to trace over photos, etc. and have no problems doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Bertakita

customer_reviews.title: Broke!
customer_reviews.text: The box light is great! Really bright and very portable because it's so bright. Only problem I had was that the cord given died already from one use. So I'd test this product when you receive it multiple times before your returning period expires
customer_reviews.author: Holly Furnish

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for the artist in your life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas present for my brother who is very into art. He loves it and uses it frequently as does his girlfriend. Great gift idea for the artist in your life!
customer_reviews.author: lspike92

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sons comic book drawings.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool little thing. My son is into drawing comics so I got this for him for Christmas so he could trace some of the designs. Came with a light bulb and the brightness was good. A bit pricey but so are all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 12-year-old daughter who kept taping things to the window to trace them. It works great (better than the windows), and our windows are now free of tape. It's also small and light-weight enough for easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Still working perfectly, a year and some change later. Quality product, solid build. Could be more portable, but there are newer models which address this. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: tentacle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for copying.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my pattern tracing for my quilt projects, but my granddaughter enjoys it even more. LOL. I may have to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie Stodgel

customer_reviews.title: My light box
customer_reviews.text: Product received on time. Fit my desk well and works o.k. so far. The light could have been a little brighter because I am working miniature painting, so many little things I am trying to see. But it will pass until I happen to run into a brighter light box.
customer_reviews.author: Sandic

customer_reviews.title: Light Tracer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6-yr-old granddaughter with some trepidation. Why not let a 6-yr-old just draw whatever she wants and put it on the fridge and let it be done. But, her parents requested this as a birthday present. What I've seen is a vast improvement in her minor motor coordination skills. she is now able to trace details and understands some of the rudimentary principles of shading and shadows. She made her entire class Valentines which she used antique Valentine cards to replicate. She loves it and I'm happy the results have been so positive.
customer_reviews.author: Lunar Day

customer_reviews.title: Great light box and good price!
customer_reviews.text: I looked online at several light boxes from different sources this product was the cheapest I could find for the size I needed. It's simple to use, sturdy and works great! I am a fine arts major and I use this or school, it's perfect for hobbies and light use. For more intense use I would seek out a larger size. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mystical faery dream

customer_reviews.title: A good basic light box
customer_reviews.text: This light box does the job. The surface is pretty easy to clean and sturdy. I find the press-and-hold switch a tad annoying, but that is a minor issue. I would rather just have a simple on-off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Veinglory

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The light is bright, the drawing space is big enough for even a 9x12 sketchbook page. Only complaint is that the button to turn it on is a little strange and takes some wiggling sometimes to get it to turn on, but once you figure it out it works just fine. Light shines through several layers of paper (I've tested up to four and could still see through all of them).
customer_reviews.author: Samara Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Light pretty even across the face
customer_reviews.text: Have used once. Light pretty even across the face. Nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Bev in Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a early birthday present to myself. It arrive early, it was in great condition. I'm happy with it. I use it almost every other day when I have a break.
customer_reviews.author: JGTrejo

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased with the Light Tracer
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with the Light Tracer. It is very lightweight, provides the perfect amount of back light and does the job I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Crafter
customer_reviews.text: Artograph LightTracer is just what we needed!! Definately lived up to our expectations! Thank you Amazon and Uptown Craft Supplies for providing quality product and service!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good quality light box for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality light box for a very reasonable price! I have had mine for a while now and I use it at least once a week for projects. The original light is still going!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Medina

customer_reviews.title: Artograph light tracer 2
customer_reviews.text: This item has been such a great asset to my artwork! I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: clod

customer_reviews.title: Lightbox
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a lightbox for my animation classes, much cheaper and works just as well for drawing. I think it is great for my needs and at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: KDBUG

customer_reviews.title: Quilting, paper piecing and tracing.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had already done this one but it works quite well for paper piecing blocks, which I use it for. I'm a quilter so I will give it plenty of use.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L. Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small and easy to use. This was it! When I received this, all I had to do was plug it in and turn it on. The only thing I would have different is maybe have some clips on top to hold paper onto the drawing surface, but that is not any real concern. I love this product and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene from Maine

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the LightTracer Light Box just before Christmas and it arrived on the 24th around 5:00pm. Whew, just in time! My grandchildren (ages 10 and 13) were delighted and said it was just like the ones they use at school, but more portable. They have been using it constantly since Christmas. I really appreciate your Fast Shipping option so I could have it under the tree by Christmas morning. My regards, Ella and Jonah's Grammy, Pamela Norwitt
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Norwitt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works and was what my wife needed. Very handy and shipping was quick
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive light box to use for sorting slides and viewing black and white contact sheets. It is small and will fit on a desk top, so it will be handy and be adequate for the job.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Light box for quilting
customer_reviews.text: I work on a lot of quilts and was tired of taping pattern to a window to be able to trace appliqué patterns. The light box provides good lighting and a smooth surface to trace patterns and I don't even have to tape them.
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Milner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived before it was due and was just what was expected
customer_reviews.author: Chris Domzalski

customer_reviews.title: It was very good.
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult for a light box to have any real negative aspects. This light box worked perfectly. I was able to trace an image onto tracing paper and then add to that copy. It was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kercher

customer_reviews.title: great seller!
customer_reviews.text: received in a timely manner as promised ...great product by the way!
customer_reviews.author: C. J.Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great for photo negatives.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of old photo negatives and I used this light box to view them all and sort through them and it was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hazlett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: As this was about the least costly lightbox listed, I expected the old adage "You get what you pay for" to apply. However, I was very pleasantly surprised to find what a quality lightbox this is. It is small and portable, yet evenly lit across the surface with a pure, white light. Perfect for reviewing fifty year old Kodachrome and Ektachrome slides prior to scanning.
customer_reviews.author: Pat A. Wertheim

customer_reviews.title: Better then nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few time and for what I need it for it is OK but the switch to turn it on is a problem and has to be turned on and off several time to get it to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Criswell

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this!!
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be just what I needed. The perfect size, lightweight and definitely does the job.Glad
customer_reviews.author: C. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest light box I could find and it works wonderfully. It is very bright, and easily goes through Bristol paper (that I do watercolors on). It's EXTREMELY light, very easy to transport. I work on it on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Col

customer_reviews.title: great Light box
customer_reviews.text: great Light box for an even greater price. I use it all the time. I advise you to use this with the lights off, though, or in a very dark room because the light isn't so bright.
customer_reviews.author: J. Herrera

product_meta.title: Artograph 225-375 LightTracer 2 Light Box
product_meta.description: Style:LightTracer2| Size:12 X 18 lit areaThe new LED LightTracer2 now shine with dazzlingly bright LEDs, with no bulbs to change. Features a 12 x 18 inch (305 x 457 mm) conveniently slanted lighted surface and handy recessed tool tray to keep pencils, chalk, embossing stylus, and other tracing tools at your fingertips. The LightTracers are entirely made in the USA, assembled in Artograph’s Delano, Minnesota factory, with parts made by other local Midwest companies. Not only is the quality higher than ever, but the products’ profile is ever more green and efficient. Even the cartons are locally made from 100% recycled materials
feature_bullets: 12 x 18 inch (305 x 457 mm) very bright surface lit by maintenance-free LEDs.
Light weight plastic construction easy to carry and transport.
For arts and crafts tracing for drawings, sewing, quilting, embroidery patterns.
Recessed tray to hold pencils, chalk, embossing stylus, and other tools.
Made in the USA with locally sourced parts, even the carton is made from recycled materials.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars871 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
